channel.title: Mystic/Illusionist Changes Ideas
channel.description: > [color=lab]Mystic, BD, Social :speech_balloon:[/color]/[color=lapurple]Illusionist, BD, Social :speech_balloon:[/color]: > = > New passive called: Talented Mind - Immune to anything that stops speech (distract, chill (you get the soul back), etc.) both Illusionist and Mystic would have it > > Reason: Tbh it doesn't make much sense that can happen to them > > Private Matter is gone but given to Noble and Noble Twin is gone > > Reason: It makes more sense with Noble and it can help him with stuff > > Mental Blur is gone but replaced with Conduit > > Reason: I mean who ever uses Mental Blur? Players remember stuff easily. Conduit on Illusionist would be very interesting to see. Even if not given conduit, mental blur should still be replaced > > Conduit gets 3 uses > > Reason: Conduit imo should get 3 uses since it is not that strong or maybe even 4

item.title: Mystic/Illusionist Changes Ideas
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Mystic, BD, Social /Illusionist, BD, Social :

New passive called: Talented Mind - Immune to anything that stops speech (distract, chill (you get the soul back), etc.) both Illusionist and Mystic would have it

Reason: Tbh it doesnâ€™t make much sense that can happen to them

Private Matter is gone but given to Noble and Noble Twin is gone

Reason: It makes more sense with Noble and it can help him with stuff

Mental Blur is gone but replaced with Conduit

Reason: I mean who ever uses Mental Blur? Players remember stuff easily. Conduit on Illusionist would be very interesting to see. Even if not given conduit, mental blur should still be replaced

Conduit gets 3 uses

Reason: Conduit imo should get 3 uses since it is not that strong or maybe even 4

Read full topic
